sentences.sContent: The study has also been cited as compelling evidence for screening by the patient advocacy group Lung Cancer Alliance.
sentences.sContent_eng: The study has also been cited as compelling evidence for screening by the patient advocacy group Lung Cancer Alliance.
sentences.sCn: 此研究已经被肺癌联盟的拥护此筛查方案的病人群体作为一种强有力的证据所引用。

remMethod.val: 来自advocate(v. 拥护， 支持)

trans.tranOther: public support for a course of action or way of doing things
